movie.title: The Trial of the Moke
movie.plot: Henry Flipper is the first black West Point graduate. Assigned to serve at Fort Davis in Texas, Flipper becomes the object of a conspiracy by his fellow cadets to rid the base of its only black graduate.

events.title: Henry O. Flipper becomes the first black man to graduate from West Point military adademy
